articles.description: Cheltenham Festival LIVE: Gold Cup, Triumph Hurdle & Albert Bartlett Novices' Hurdle - results, commentary & updates
articles.title: Cheltenham Gold Cup 2024 LIVE: Races, results & radio coverage

articles.description: Arsenal have been drawn against Bayern Munich in the quarter-finals of the Champions League, while Manchester City will play Real Madrid.
articles.title: Arsenal draw Bayern & Man City face Real in quarters

articles.description: Liverpool will play Italian club Atalanta in the quarter-finals of the Europa League with West Ham taking on German side Bayer Leverkusen.
articles.title: Liverpool face Atalanta & West Ham draw Leverkusen

articles.description: Galopin Des Champs defends the Cheltenham Gold Cup to crown a historic week for trainer Willie Mullins.
articles.title: Cheltenham Gold Cup 2024: Galopin Des Champs wins again for Willie Mullins

articles.description: George Martin has won 10 Test caps and is still in the relative infancy of his international career, but his performances for England have belied his 22 years.
articles.title: England's enforcer Martin set to lead the way in 'Le Crunch'

articles.description: This season's Champions League quarter-finals have mouth-watering match-ups wherever you look. Where does Phil McNulty think the ties will be won and lost?
articles.title: Five Champions League match-ups to look forward to

articles.description: Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag says the club did not go to the trouble of getting Marcus Rashford to sign a long-term contract just so they could sell him in the summer.
articles.title: Rashford 'should be part of this project' - Ten Hag

articles.description: Australian Open champion Jannik Sinner extends his winning run to 19 matches before a bee swarm holds up Carlos Alcaraz at Indian Wells.
articles.title: Indian Wells: Jannik Sinner extends winning run as bee swarm halts Carlos Alcaraz match

articles.description: Former Manchester United manager Sir Alex Ferguson looks back on the 1996 FA Cup Final which his side beat a famously white suit cladded Liverpool team 1-0.
articles.title: When I saw the suits I said 1-0 - Ferguson on 96 FA Cup final

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on Anna Friedberg and Emily Linden from alt-rock band Friedberg to make predictions for this weekend's FA Cup quarter-final ties and Premier League games.
articles.title: Sutton's FA Cup & Premier League predictions v alt-rock band Friedberg
